channel.title: Need help with WEBCLIENT "Error. Click for details" GIVING REP+++++
channel.description: Hello guys, i need some friendly, and easy help with my latest problem. My Webclient that i have posted to the website will not Load, not even on my mac computer when i go on the website. I don't know if i have linked the cache correctly using drop box or even if i have linked it with the client correctly. Here are the links to my cache and client https://www.dropbox.com/s/88fvvwvnh7ye91d/.TrisidiaXCache.zip?m https://www.dropbox.com/s/1znhlwmmzvjb8iz/webclient.jar?m Here are some media of what shows up on my screen. P.S. My cache did not have a sign link or Sign folder -_- Another problem I have come across is when I tried a different host (000host.com) It came up with another error, it came up with error click for details again but then when i witnessed the details it came up with 'Incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class file client"? any ideas?

item.title: Need help with WEBCLIENT "Error. Click for details" GIVING REP+++++
item.dc:creator: @ggson ggson
item.description:
@ggson wrote:

I will try it now
EDIT:
Nope still same problem. Ill give you the link to my site
http://djtazsuck1.wix.com/deathlypkz#!play/c9qb
Should i try makeing the webclient.jar a zipped file instead? e.g. webclient.zip.
or any other ideas?
p.s. is there a chance someone could actually do it for me? they would be rewarded in the rsps if they can solve it.

Read full topic
